rows.label: tlk43400541_03_msg0001
rows.name:
You know the Old Quarry?
It's off to the left if you go through
the Stone Gate Ruins from here.

rows.label: tlk43400541_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Some terrible monsters have made
their lair up there.

rows.label: tlk43400541_03_msg0003
rows.name:
We're always discussing whether we
should leave it to the monsters or try
and claim it back.

rows.label: tlk43400541_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Queen Lagert prefers the status quo
it seems.

rows.label: tlk43400541_03_msg0005
rows.name:
If we could get it back, we could start
quarrying again, so Fons Maim could
flourish...

rows.label: tlk43400541_03_msg0006
rows.name:
But maybe the queen's right and the
sacrifices would be too great...
